title: Getting Started
description: Install page and build your first static site in under a minute.

title: Configuration
description: Complete page.toml reference — site settings, collections, build options, deployment, languages, and images.

title: Collections
description: Configure content collections — posts, docs, pages, changelog, roadmap, and trust center — with pagination, date handling, and RSS.

title: Templates & Themes
description: Customize your site with Tera templates, overridable blocks, and six bundled themes.

title: Shortcodes
description: Reusable content components for embedding videos, callouts, figures, and custom elements in markdown

title: Multi-Language
description: Add translations to your site with filename-based i18n — per-language URLs, RSS, sitemaps, and discovery files.

title: Deployment
description: Deploy your page site to GitHub Pages, Cloudflare Pages, or Netlify.

title: Trust Center
description: Build a compliance hub with certifications, subprocessors, FAQs, and security policies

title: AI Agent
description: Use page agent to get AI assistance with content creation, site management, and theme generation.

title: Workspaces
description: Manage multiple page sites in a single repository with shared resources, unified dev server, and coordinated deploys.

title: MCP Server
description: Structured AI access to site content, configuration, themes, and build tools via the Model Context Protocol.

title: Theme Gallery
description: Browse all bundled themes with visual previews. Install community themes or generate your own with AI.

title: CLI Reference
description: Complete reference for all page CLI commands, flags, and options.

title: v0.1.0
description: Initial public release of page — the AI-native static site generator built in Rust.

title: Multi-LLM Agent Integration
description: Support Claude Code, OpenCode, Codex CLI, and Gemini CLI as interchangeable agent backends

title: Incremental Builds
description: Only rebuild changed pages in dev mode for faster iteration on large sites

title: External Data Sources
description: Fetch JSON/YAML from URLs at build time and inject into template context

title: Math and LaTeX Rendering
description: Server-side KaTeX rendering for inline and display math blocks in markdown

title: AVIF Image Format
description: Generate AVIF variants alongside WebP in the image pipeline

title: Related Posts
description: Auto-suggest related content based on shared tags and keywords

title: Theme Community Ecosystem
description: Curated theme registry, browse command, validation, and contributor guide

title: Deploy History and Rollback
description: Track deploy history with content hashing, diff previews, and one-command rollback

title: Environment-Aware Builds
description: Auto-detect CI environments and support multi-environment config sections

title: S3 Hosting Target
description: AWS S3 + CloudFront deploy support

title: Subdomain Deploys
description: Per-collection subdomain support for deploying collections to separate domains
